message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with algorithms for network traversal and search, which are common topics in distributed computing (cs.DC) and networked information systems (cs.NI). The use of advice and the study of tradeoffs between information and cost suggest a focus on algorithmic decision-making and optimization, which are also relevant to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and data structures (cs.DS). Finally, the paper's analysis of upper and lower bounds on the optimal size of advice suggests a theoretical focus, which is also relevant to the sub-category of social and information networks (cs.SI).
